Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我打算研究互联网金融与大数据的关系。首先，收集大数据在互联网金融中的应用实例。然后，查询大数据分析技术在风险控制中的作用。接着，了解大数据如何优化互联网金融的营销策略。最后，研究相关法律法规对互联网金融大数据使用的约束。当前这一步的目标是什么?
研究互联网金融与大数据的关系
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
ResearchFramework.create_study_plan
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?
study_plan

{'study_plan': '1. Collect examples of big data applications in internet finance. 2. Investigate the role of big data analytics in risk control. 3. Understand how big data optimizes marketing strategies in internet finance. 4. Study the legal and regulatory constraints on the use of big data in internet finance.'}
